description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Unleash your inner drummer with A-Band. The Arcade mode features 12 of the most promising indie bands from around the world: USA, Japan, Germany, UK, Brazil... and much more. Learn real drumming in School of Rock and playback your own creations at the Record Studio. Plug your drum kit in and CRANK IT UP! A-Band is the ultimate way for pros and beginners to jam on Xbox360.
description.short: Unleash your inner drummer with A-Band. The Arcade mode features 12 of the most promising indie bands from around the world: USA, Japan, Germany, UK, Brazil... and much more. Learn real drumming in School of Rock and playback your own creations at the Record Studio. Plug your drum kit in and CRANK IT UP! A-Band is the ultimate way for pros and beginners to jam on Xbox360.
